structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Search Warrants, Rewards, Fugitives From Justice, Arrest, Examination, Commitment And Bail. Probation Officers And Board Of Probation

law.catch_line: Fees And Expenses In District Court In Record Sent To Superior Court
law.text: If the defendant is held to appear before the superior court, the copies and record of proceedings sent to the superior court shall contain the details of all fees and expenses allowed or paid in the district court.
